name: A Spark of Courage (Beta v. 0.2)
description:
In the realm of Cosmantia, the beings of this world are born with magical abilities called Zenith Powers. As one grows up and evolves in this world, their powers too, will develop. Young Greenster was only 8 years old when he had his Zenith Power stolen from him by an evil entity known as the Annihilation Emperor. 10 years later, he gets a fateful encounter with one of the all powerful Zenith Dragon Gods. Armed with a new power, he sets off on a journey to find the Annihilation Emperor and take his old power back, but he's not alone. A girl from his forgotten past will travel alongside him, helping him every step of the way.

Join Greenster as he finds his Spark of Courage!
